reviews.review_text: Amazing atmosphere, superb music, what amazing music. It was next level. I was floored. Guys must visit with friends and family. Just too good. Loved the service, the vibe and the ambiance. Akhil was just too awesome in the amazing service he gave, keep it up guys.

My recent visit to Bending Bamboos was nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment I stepped in, I was enveloped in a warm and inviting atmosphere. The ambient lighting, soothing decor, and gentle background music created a relaxed yet elegant setting, perfect for unwinding after a long day or enjoying a special evening out.

The food, however, was the true star of the evening. Every dish was a culinary delight, specially the Tandoori Chicken, the beautifully presented appetizers to the mouth-watering main courses. The flavors were vibrant and expertly balanced, clearly crafted with fresh, high-quality ingredients. Whether you’re a fan of hearty classics or looking for something more innovative, the menu offers something for every palate.

In conclusion, Bending Bamboos is a gem for anyone seeking good food, great ambience, and even better service. It’s the kind of place where you leave not just satisfied, but eager to return. Highly recommended!

Our second visit on this holiday, great service from Akim , popular with UK tourists. Recommended by a couple from Bradford , who know a thing or 2 about curry . . Chicken vindaloo , chilli chicken fry , keema naan , jeera rice , starter of stuffed mushrooms . . Washed down with water , kingfisher , and feni ☺️
